sentences.sContent: So they photographed the birds — which don't sweat — with heat-sensing cameras.
sentences.sContent_eng: So they photographed the birds — which don't sweat — with heat-sensing cameras.
sentences.sCn: 于是，研究人员们用热感应照相机对这些不流汗的鸟进行了拍照。

sentences.sContent: The diamondback rattler has hollow, bony cavities above the nose called pit organs containing ultra-thin, heat-sensing membranes that activate receptors connected to the brain.
sentences.sContent_eng: The diamondback rattler has hollow, bony cavities above the nose called pit organs containing ultra-thin, heat-sensing membranes that activate receptors connected to the brain.
sentences.sCn: 响尾蛇位于鼻子上的中空骨腔被称为颊窝器官，内含热敏感的极度薄膜，是与大脑相连的刺激感受器。
